definition: Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
to rein in/to compel/to force/to carve/to engrave/(literary) to command/to lead/bridle/(physics) abbr. for 勒克斯[le4 ke4 si1], lux

sentences.english: My wife and I have used the money from this account to go skiing in The Rockies in Whistler, BC.
sentences.chinese: 太太和我用這筆錢去惠斯勒山滑雪。

sentences.english: All you need to know about tickets for the abolition of Whistler Blackcomb.
sentences.chinese: 一切您需要知道的關於取消門票惠斯勒黑梳。

sentences.english: Welcome to Four Seasons Resort Whistler.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎光臨惠斯勒四季度假村。

sentences.english: Do you have information about the ski trip to Whistler?
sentences.chinese: 有沒有關於惠斯勒滑雪旅遊的介紹？

sentences.english: Buy "tickets" in the resort of Whistler "Blackcomb" lift and save.
sentences.chinese: 購買門票的升降機勝地惠斯勒黑梳和保存。
